text:
The pertinent error message out of all that is:

mod_authnz_ldap.c:40:2: #error mod_authnz_ldap requires APR-util to have LDAP
support built in. To fix add --with-ldap to ./configure.

you need to rebuild passing --with-ldap to configure.

creator: pierre42d@9online.fr
text: Yes but a problem is that this option is not shown if you make a ./configure --help
